actionTemplate.title: Men's Brow
steps: Keep the shape straighter with a subtle arch
Fill gaps with hair-like strokes, not hard outlines
Light front and slightly deeper tail without over-tapering
Brush through to follow hair direction and soften edges
Lightly clean stray edges with concealer if needed

rationaleTemplate: Hair-stroke filling looks more natural than heavy outlining.
Great for everyday, clean, understated looks.
